descriptionHtml:
MCking-nightmotherReplacer
Author: MCking



description

This mod replaces Night Mother of Dark Brotherhood. Instead of being an abominable carcass from Vanilla game, Night Mother now has smoother, glossy skin.

install

please install path Skyrim DATA folder,

meshes\clutter\nightmother\nmbody01.nif
textures\armor\mcking_cuttler\femalebody_1.dds
textures\armor\mcking_cuttler\femalehands_1.dds
textures\armor\mcking_cuttler\femalehead.dds
textures\armor\mcking_cuttler\hairpromise.dds
textures\armor\mcking_cuttler\hairpromise_n.dds


Tools:

3dsmax 2012
Nifscope

Credits:

MCking
UNPB
Bethesda

Thanks to Skyrim Nexus.
author: MCKING
